trans-unit.source: Describes the version of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a versão de um <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> values are used when retrieving the value found in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> using <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> valores são usados durante a recuperação do valor encontrado em uma <xref:System.Data.DataRow> usando <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> do <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> informs you what version of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> exists.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> informa qual versão de um <xref:System.Data.DataRow> existe.

trans-unit.source: Versions change under the following circumstances:
After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method, if you change the value, the `Current` and `Proposed` values become available.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> método, se você alterar o valor de `Current` e `Proposed` valores se tornam disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> método, o `Proposed` valor é excluído.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> method, the Proposed value becomes the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> método, o valor proposto torna-se a `Current` valor.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> método, o `Original` valor fica idêntico de `Current` valor.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataTable> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> método, o `Original` valor fica idêntico de `Current` valor.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is discarded, and the version becomes `Current`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> método, o `Proposed` valor é descartado e torna-se a versão `Current`.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> before invoking the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir verifica o <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> de um <xref:System.Data.DataRow> antes de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> método.
A linha contém os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For a <see langword="DataRowState" /> value of <see langword="Added" />, <see langword="Modified" /> or <see langword="Deleted" />, the default version is <see langword="Current" />.
trans-unit.target: Para um valor <see langword="DataRowState" /> igual a <see langword="Added" />, <see langword="Modified" /> ou <see langword="Deleted" />, a versão padrão é <see langword="Current" />.

trans-unit.source: For a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowState" /> value of <see langword="Detached" />, the version is <see langword="Proposed" />.
trans-unit.target: Para um valor <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowState" /> igual a <see langword="Detached" />, a versão é <see langword="Proposed" />.

trans-unit.source: The row contains its original values.
trans-unit.target: A linha contém os valores originais.

trans-unit.source: The row contains a proposed value.
trans-unit.target: A linha contém um valor proposto.
